name: B. The Same Calendar
statement:
The girl Taylor has a beautiful calendar for the year . In the calendar
all days are given with their days of week: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday,
Thursday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday.The calendar is so beautiful that
she wants to know what is the next year after when the calendar will be
exactly the same. Help Taylor to find that year.Note that leap years has
days. The year is leap if it is divisible by or it is divisible by , but
not by (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leap_year).
